thread.section_title: Property Matrix Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Property Matrix | propertymatrix.com
thread.title: Paul Sturino
thread.title_full: Property Matrix reviewed by Paul Sturino

author: Paul Sturino
title: Paul Sturino
text:
The product is starting to develop. The Support group has been great and we should have utilize them more in the first 2 months. The product is very customizable and they are willing to listen. As I learn more of how to use the system I see more and more benefit.
Con - No training manual or how to briefs - Terms are different in both accounting and maintenance.
I would like to provide a review at our one year anniversary - I think I will have a lot more input that at three months
